channel.title: Calls on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Calls on My New Hugo Site

item.description: *** Call for Papers/Posters: PolMeth Europe Meeting 2023 *** Date: 19 - 20 June 2023 Location: King’s College London, London, UK Deadline for proposals: 28th February 2023 Notification of acceptance: 31st March 2023 Please submit your extended abstract and join us in London in June 2023 for the 3rd PolMeth Europe meeting. For the first time, the PolMeth Europe Conference will be held in person. PolMeth Europe brings together junior and senior scholars interested in innovative research methods and their applications.
